projects.title: Smart Churn Predictor
projects.short_desc: E2E Data Engineering & Science pipeline to predict customer churn.
projects.full_desc: Design of a workflow that extracts sales data, transforms it using dbt, and applies XGBoost algorithms to alert the marketing team about at-risk customers.

projects.title: Real-time Stock Engine
projects.short_desc: Real-time data ingestion with Spark and Kafka to optimize inventory.
projects.full_desc: Data Engineering architecture using Kafka to process live sales data and update optimal stock levels using demand forecasting models.

projects.title: CLV Forecasting System
projects.short_desc: Customer Lifetime Value prediction on Google Cloud Platform.
projects.full_desc: Predictive model deployed on Vertex AI estimating the future value of customers based on historical behavior and advanced segmentation.

projects.title: Dynamic Pricing Engine
projects.short_desc: Dynamic pricing algorithm based on competition and demand.
projects.full_desc: Development of a pricing engine that adjusts tags in real-time by analyzing the external market and internal inventory levels.

projects.title: AI Audit Automation
projects.short_desc: Tax audit automation using ML and anomaly detection.
projects.full_desc: System for detecting irregularities in accounting transactions. Uses Isolation Forest to identify suspicious records before the financial close.

projects.title: Consolidated Wealth View
projects.short_desc: Modern Data Warehouse in Snowflake for consolidated reporting.
projects.full_desc: Implementation of dbt and Snowflake to unify multiple banking sources into a single dimensional model for executive KPIs.

projects.title: Tax Compliance Optimizer
projects.short_desc: Automated tax compliance pipeline deployed on AWS.
projects.full_desc: Structuring massive billing data to ensure compliance with local regulations and detect potential tax savings.

projects.title: Investment Risk Analytics
projects.short_desc: Portfolio risk analysis using Monte Carlo simulations.
projects.full_desc: Simulation tool designed to predict asset volatility and optimize capital distribution within investment portfolios.

projects.title: Credit Scoring 4.0
projects.short_desc: Credit risk modeling based on deep transactional behavior.
projects.full_desc: Credit evaluation algorithm that analyzes transactional variables to assign dynamic credit limits in seconds.

projects.title: Fraud Shield Real-time
projects.short_desc: Real-time fraud prevention system for credit card transactions.
projects.full_desc: Live transaction monitor that blocks suspicious operations using neural network models and strict business rules.

projects.title: AML Monitor Pipeline
projects.short_desc: Anti-Money Laundering detection using graph analytics.
projects.full_desc: Pipeline identifying circular transaction networks and suspicious behavior linked to money laundering.

projects.title: Next Best Offer (NBO)
projects.short_desc: Personalized financial product recommendation engine.
projects.full_desc: Intelligent recommender that suggests the next best product (insurance, credit, savings) based on the customer's lifecycle.

projects.title: Hospital Flow Optimizer
projects.short_desc: Wait-time optimization for hospital emergency rooms.
projects.full_desc: Analysis of bottlenecks through data simulation to redistribute medical staff based on demand peaks.

projects.title: Readmission Risk Engine
projects.short_desc: 30-day readmission prediction for chronic patients.
projects.full_desc: Classification model evaluating the probability of a patient relapse based on clinical history and treatments.

projects.title: Medical Imaging AI
projects.short_desc: Pathology detection in X-Rays using computer vision.
projects.full_desc: Image processing pipeline leveraging convolutional neural networks to assist in early disease diagnosis.

projects.title: Pharma Supply Chain 360
projects.short_desc: Traceability visibility for highly sensitive medications.
projects.full_desc: Integrated dashboard monitoring drug temperature and location throughout the entire cold chain process.

projects.title: AI Route Optimizer
projects.short_desc: Last-mile route optimization integrating traffic data.
projects.full_desc: Algorithm calculating the most efficient route for delivery fleets, integrating live traffic APIs and load constraints.

projects.title: Warehouse Digital Twin
projects.short_desc: 3D simulation and monitoring of warehouse operations.
projects.full_desc: Modeling picking and packing flows to identify physical interferences and optimize the operational layout.

projects.title: Supply Chain Control Tower
projects.short_desc: Global control tower for monitoring shipping containers.
projects.full_desc: Platform centralizing data from shipping lines, customs, and ground transport into a single analytical 'source of truth'.

projects.title: Last-Mile Delivery Bot
projects.short_desc: Automated order tracking and customer notifications.
projects.full_desc: Event-driven system that triggers customer alerts and optimizes delivery windows based on the driver's live GPS position.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance AI
projects.short_desc: Industrial machinery failure prediction using IoT sensors.
projects.full_desc: Analysis of vibration and temperature data to predict when a machine requires maintenance before unplanned downtime occurs.

projects.title: Energy Consumption Forecast
projects.short_desc: Energy demand forecasting for cost optimization.
projects.full_desc: Time series model estimating the plant's electricity consumption to negotiate tariffs and reduce peak demand costs.

projects.title: Computer Vision Quality
projects.short_desc: Automated quality control on the production line.
projects.full_desc: Detection of aesthetic defects in finished products using high-speed cameras and Deep Learning models.

projects.title: OEE Real-time Monitor
projects.short_desc: Automatic calculation of Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE).
projects.full_desc: Pipeline connecting machine PLCs with executive dashboards to measure Availability, Performance, and Quality in real-time.
